tweet: Starting today, you can convert one crypto to another on Coinbase. Conversions are available between Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH), Ethereum Classic (ETC),  Litecoin (LTC), 0x (ZRX), or Bitcoin Cash (BCH).  It's Day 8 of 12 Days of Coinbase. 1 year ago today, @MakerDAO launched $DAI - an experimental crypto-backed stablecoin on Ethereum.  Since then, the MakerDAO system: *Grew to hold over 1.6mil ether *Has kept $DAI's peg during a 94% drawdown on ETH *Has secured over 5000 CDPs (and counting)  Happy 1st BirthDAI! 🎉

ELI5: randomness in Ethereum 2.0 using a VDF  100 people, one by one, (re)roll dice placed in a dark room. After the last person lights turn on, revealing a fair random number. The Verifiable Delay Function (VDF) ensures lights aren't turned on early.
